backend/main.mo: Motoko backend defining garment design types, user profiles, and CRUD operations with authorization checks.
feature_evidence.json: Feature-to-file mapping report listing implemented features, associated source files, components, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of multiple frontend files describing their roles in the Dripify app.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind-based global stylesheet defining theming variables, dark mode tokens, and base styles.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML document that loads the React app via the main TypeScript entry point.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app managing authentication, design editing workflow, UI layout, and tabbed 2D/3D interfaces.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Login/logout button using Internet Identity with query cache clearing and error handling.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Dialog for first‑time users to enter and save their display name with validation and mutation handling.
frontend/src/components/dripify/AppLayou: Provides the main page layout with background texture and a footer containing social links and dynamic app info.
frontend/src/components/dripify/editor/D: Implements a 2D canvas for rendering, selecting, and dragging text layers with grid and styling support.
frontend/src/components/dripify/editor/F: Provides a searchable, categorized font selection popover that updates a selected text layer’s font.
frontend/src/components/dripify/editor/L: Shows a list of text layers with options to add, select, reorder, and delete layers.
frontend/src/components/dripify/editor/T: Offers controls for editing text content, font, style, size, rotation, and color of the active text layer.
frontend/src/components/dripify/GarmentS: Renders a garment selection card allowing users to pick between preset garment types with thumbnail previews.
frontend/src/components/dripify/HeaderBa: Displays the top navigation bar with logo, auth controls, and design save/load actions based on user authentication.
frontend/src/components/dripify/persiste: UI sheet to list, load, rename, and delete saved designs using design hooks and dialogs.
Provides a dialog for naming and saving a design, validating input and sending formatted layer data to persistence hooks.
frontend/src/components/dripify/preview3: Renders a 3D garment preview with react-three-fiber, selecting models and applying a generated design texture.
Three.js hoodie mock model that slowly rotates and displays the design texture on a front plane.
Three.js t‑shirt mock model with rotating group and a front design texture plane.
Generates a THREE.CanvasTexture by drawing text layers onto an offscreen canvas.
frontend/src/fonts/fontRegistry.ts: Registry of available fonts with names, families, categories, and availability flags.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, invalidating dependent queries on identity change.
frontend/src/hooks/useDesigns.ts: React Query hooks for listing, fetching, saving, renaming, and deleting user designs via the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Internet Identity auth context providing identity state, login, logout, and initialization logic.
frontend/src/hooks/useUserProfile.ts: Hooks for retrieving and saving the caller's user profile through the backend actor with query invalidation.
frontend/src/index.css: Imports many Google Fonts, initializes Tailwind layers, and defines global OKLCH color variables and base styles.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and an Internet Identity provider, then renders App.
frontend/src/state/dripify/designState.t: Defines text-layer and design state structures and provides helpers to create, update, delete, and reorder text layers.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides utilities for reading URL parameters, persisting them in sessionStorage, and managing hash-based query data.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind theme extensions, color mappings to CSS variables, animations, and plugin setup.
project_state.json: Describes the Dripify project state, features, assets, and versioning metadata for the build plan.
